name: smart_home_automation
description: Control smart home devices (lights, thermostat, locks, camera, speakers) by manipulating objects and calling their methods to automate home scenes.

turns.query: I'm going to watch a movie in the living room. Set the mood - dim the lights to 20% brightness.

I'm leaving home. Check all doors and lock any that are unlocked. Then turn off all lights in the house, but make sure the security camera stays on and starts recording. Finally, calculate the total power consumption of all remaining active devices.
